person.persName: Thomas Jefferson Pitzer (Barbourville, Knox County, Kentucky, mechanic)

body.p: Barbourville, Knox County, Kentucky, mechanic. Married to Mary Pitzer. Father of George Pitzer, Gimrata Pitzer, Virginia Pitzer, Elizabeth Pitzer, and Lucy Pitzer. Tailor in Barborville, Knox County, Kentucky in 1850. Mechanic in Barbourville, Knox County, Kentucky in 1860. Enrolled for military duty in Eighth District of Kentucky on July 1, 1863 (U.S.A).
